name: MerchantDetails
desc: Detailed information for a single registered merchant.

items.name: domainNames
items.desc: A list of fully qualified domain names for which Apple Pay processes payments for this merchant.

items.name: encryptTo
items.desc: A SHA-256 hash of the merchant ID that you provided for the encrypTo value when calling Register Merchant.

items.name: merchantUrl
items.desc: The websiteâ€™s top-level domain. May be empty if you don't provide this value when registering the merchant.

items.name: partnerInternalMerchantIdentifier
items.desc: The identifier that uniquely identifies the merchant.

items.name: partnerMerchantName
items.desc: A human-readable name for the merchant.
